entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:51 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of snow changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Wind south 40 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:08 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 8:08 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:08 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow. Windy. Low zero. Forecast issued 8:08 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High 10. Forecast issued 8:08 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 8:08 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High zero. Forecast issued 8:08 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 8:08 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. Forecast issued 8:08 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 8:08 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 8. Forecast issued 8:08 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Low zero. Forecast issued 8:08 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
